name: Gleam Development Environment
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y erlang-dev erlang-parsetools && sudo apt-get install -y curl && curl -L -o gleam.tar.gz https://github.com/gleam-lang/gleam/releases/download/v1.3.1/gleam-v1.3.1-x86_64-unknown-linux-musl.tar.gz && sudo tar -xzf gleam.tar.gz -C /usr/local/bin && rm gleam.tar.gz && gleam deps download
